features: PARA method developed by Tiago Forte (was explained in the tutorial).; Goals: track all your goals and projects related to them.; Birds-Eye view: to zoom out and overlook your goals according to the quarter of the year or even years ahead.; Task Manager: to control all your tasks whatever the status of the task.; Recurring Tasks: automate the tasks you do each fixed period.; Day planner: plan your day in an effective and efficient way.; Relationships management: notion will remind you to call the people you want to keep in touch with them (friends, relatives, or even clients).; Review: focus on the tasks and projects you are working on and revise them continuously.; Daily Journaling.; Books Tracker: track your books and know your progress in each book.
